channel.title: Delta cliant not working
channel.description:
I set everything up and everything is working fine.,.. but when i try and log into the server thiers always an error while trying to connect... idk whats wrong with this thing... can someone please help me i have TV so u can walk it through with me please! THanks
blackpanther0928

item.title: Delta cliant not working
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Before we get to the TV part…
Make sure:

  1. No Firewalls are blocking the port.
  2. Your no-ip is properly connected.
  3. Check your ip by the cmd prompt to see if you portforwarded on the correct ip.
  4. Make sure you compiled correctly after changing the IP in the client.
  5. Can you connect to the server if the IP is on 127.0.0.1
  6. Did you change the IP in the server files?
    Many more questions i have but lets start with the basic ones.

Read full topic
